mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.id) as totalRestaurants, COALESCE(SUM(r.review_count), 0) as totalReviews, COALESCE(AVG(r.rating), 0.0) as averageRating, COUNT(DISTINCT res.id) as totalReservations FROM restaurants r LEFT JOIN reservations res ON r.id = res.restaurant_id WHERE r.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND r.is_active = 1
SELECT r.id, r.name, r.category, r.location, r.image, r.rating, r.review_count as reviewCount, r.is_active as isActive FROM restaurants r WHERE r.owner_id = #{ownerId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurants SET rating = COALESCE((SELECT AVG(rating) FROM reviews WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND is_active = true), 0), review_count = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reviews WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND is_active = true) WHERE id = #{restaurantId}
